description: Grants the user permanently elongated and sharpened fingernails that can create razor-sharp wind slashes capable of cutting through rock and steel. The user becomes a 'Sickle Human.'

users.circumstances: Eric consumed the fruit at an unknown time before the Warship Island Arc

abilityReveals.description: Eric releases multiple razor-sharp air blades in an X-formation pattern. These wind slashes are powerful enough to slice through multiple targets.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Eric uses this technique against Zoro and the Straw Hat crew during combat.

weaknesses.weakness: Standard Devil Fruit weakness - inability to swim

strengths.strength: Can attack from both close and long range
strengths.description: The wind slashes can be projected at distance while the elongated nails work in close combat.

strengths.strength: Wind attacks as sharp as legendary swords
strengths.description: Eric claims his wind slashes are as sharp as a Meito (named blade), capable of tearing people limb from limb.

description: Grants the user the ability to communicate telepathically with animals. The user can understand animals' thoughts and feelings and speak to them mentally.

users.circumstances: Apis consumed the fruit at an unknown time before meeting the Straw Hat Pirates

abilityReveals.description: Apis uses her ability to communicate with Ryu the dragon, understanding his emotions and trying to convince him not to sacrifice himself.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Apis desperately tries to communicate with Ryu as he puts himself in danger to protect her.

weaknesses.weakness: Standard Devil Fruit weakness - inability to swim

weaknesses.description: The Hiso Hiso no Mi provides no combat abilities, making the user dependent on others for protection.

strengths.strength: Can gain information and warnings from animals
strengths.description: Animals can alert the user to dangers and provide useful intelligence.

description: Grants the user's body the properties of rubber, allowing them to stretch and become immune to blunt attacks and electricity.

users.circumstances: Luffy accidentally ate the fruit as a child

abilityReveals.description: Luffy uses his rubber body to catch and deflect incoming cannonballs back at enemy ships, protecting the Going Merry from Nelson's naval bombardment.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Luffy protects his crew from Nelson's fleet by bouncing cannonballs back at the attackers.

weaknesses.weakness: Standard Devil Fruit weakness - inability to swim

strengths.description: Rubber body bounces back blunt force trauma.
Luffy's rubber body can catch and redirect incoming attacks like cannonballs.
